definitions.definition: A practice of communicating with one's God.
definitions.example: Through prayer I ask for God's blessings.
In many cultures, prayer involves singing.

definitions.definition: The specific words or methods used for praying.
A meeting held for the express purpose of praying.
definitions.example: Grandpa never misses a chance to go to prayer.
This, your honor, is my prayer; that all here be set free.

definitions.definition: (mostly in negative constructions) The remotest hope or chance.
definitions.example: That team doesn't have a prayer of winning the championship.
